objectives: Students will discuss work and career using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Science Fiction themed scenarios related to work and career
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining work and career content with Science Fiction narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore work and career through a Science Fiction lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a futuristic or technological scenario involving work and career

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to work and career in a scifi context
Students engage in scifi themed role-play about work and career using neutral register
Students create original scifi themed content about work and career in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe work and career in a Science Fiction scenario?
What technology or innovation might be involved in work and career?
Can you create a Science Fiction story about work and career?
How does work and career change when viewed through a Science Fiction perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this scifi scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Science Fiction situation involving work and career
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in scifi context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within scifi theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Science Fiction theme: Futuristic, technology, space, innovation

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Science Fiction themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
